reviewText: There is too much unnecessary violence in the film.

"Jgarna" (The Hunters) is considered by many the best Swedish thriller since Wideberg's "Mannen p taket" (Man on the roof). Hollywood wanted to make a remake of "Jgarna." Kjell Sundvall was positive to this as long as it was a "First Blood" type of film. But the American producers who wanted to buy the rights wanted to make it about cowboys in the Nevada desert, shooting horse for fun. Kjell Sundvall didn't sell the rights after he heard this. Jgarna [Region 2] (Swedish) Erik har varit polis i Stockholm i flera r. Efter ett skottdrama bestmmer han sig fr att flytta till sin bror i Norrland och sker en polistjnst dr uppe. Hans hrda polisattityd passar inte in ett samhlle som delvis styrs av oskrivna lagar. Erik brjar nysta i en jakthrva som involverar flera av hans gamla vnner. Erik som nyss hlsades hem som en hjlte blir nu allas fiende.

A film by Swedish director Kjell Sundvall.
With Rolf Lassgrd, Helena Bergstrm, Lennart Jhkel.
